descp2: The replacement codepoint to be used in place of invalid substrings in `input` when `errors='replace'`; and in place of C0 control characters in `input` when `replace_control_characters=True`.
The replacement codepoint to be used in place of invalid substrings in `input` when `errors='replace'`; and in place of C0 control characters in `input` when `replace_control_characters=True`.
